name: EnglishClearspeakCapitalLetters

tests._comment2_: TODO: (QUESTION) This is does not seem to follow the fraction rules.

Cap001._comment3_: var speech = 'the fraction with numerator sine A, and denominator a,
Cap001._comment4_: equals, the fraction with numerator sine B, and denominator b';
Cap001.expected: <?xml version="1.0"?><speak version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis"><prosody rate="100%"> <break time="250ms"/> <prosody rate="+25%"> <mark name="0"/> sine <prosody pitch="+30%"> <mark name="1"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">A</say-as> </prosody> </prosody> <mark name="5"/> over <mark name="4"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">a</say-as> <break time="250ms"/> <mark name="6"/> equals <break time="250ms"/> <prosody rate="+25%"> <mark name="7"/> sine <prosody pitch="+30%"> <mark name="8"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">B</say-as> </prosody> </prosody> <mark name="12"/> over <mark name="11"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">b</say-as> <break time="250ms"/> </prosody></speak>

Cap002.expected: <?xml version="1.0"?><speak version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis"><prosody rate="100%"> <mark name="0"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">c</say-as> <mark name="1"/> squared <mark name="3"/> equals <mark name="4"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">a</say-as> <mark name="5"/> squared <mark name="7"/> plus <mark name="8"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">b</say-as> <mark name="9"/> squared <mark name="11"/> minus <mark name="12"/> 2 <mark name="13"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">a</say-as> <mark name="14"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">b</say-as> <mark name="15"/> cosine <prosody pitch="+30%"> <mark name="16"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">C</say-as> </prosody> <break time="250ms"/> </prosody></speak>

Cap003.expected: <?xml version="1.0"?><speak version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis"><prosody rate="100%"> <mark name="0"/> tangent <prosody pitch="+30%"> <mark name="1"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">A</say-as> </prosody> <mark name="2"/> equals <break time="250ms"/> <mark name="3"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">a</say-as> <mark name="5"/> over <mark name="4"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">b</say-as> <break time="250ms"/> </prosody></speak>

Cap004.expected: <?xml version="1.0"?><speak version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis"><prosody rate="100%"> <prosody rate="+25%"> <prosody pitch="+30%"> <mark name="0"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">A</say-as> <mark name="1"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">B</say-as> </prosody> </prosody> <break time="250ms"/> </prosody></speak>

Cap005.expected: <?xml version="1.0"?><speak version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis"><prosody rate="100%"> <prosody rate="+25%"> <mark name="0"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">a</say-as> <prosody pitch="+30%"> <mark name="1"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">A</say-as> </prosody> </prosody> <break time="250ms"/> </prosody></speak>

Cap006.expected: <?xml version="1.0"?><speak version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis"><prosody rate="100%"> <prosody rate="+25%"> <mark name="0"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">b</say-as> <prosody pitch="+30%"> <mark name="1"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">A</say-as> </prosody> </prosody> <break time="250ms"/> </prosody></speak>

Cap008.expected: <?xml version="1.0"?><speak version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis"><prosody rate="100%"> <mark name="0"/> angle <prosody pitch="+30%"> <mark name="1"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">A</say-as> <mark name="2"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">B</say-as> <mark name="3"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">C</say-as> </prosody> </prosody></speak>

Cap011.expected: <?xml version="1.0"?><speak version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis"><prosody rate="100%"> <break time="250ms"/> <prosody rate="+25%"> <mark name="0"/> sine <mark name="1"/> cap A </prosody> <mark name="5"/> over <mark name="4"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">a</say-as> <break time="250ms"/> <mark name="6"/> equals <break time="250ms"/> <prosody rate="+25%"> <mark name="7"/> sine <mark name="8"/> cap B </prosody> <mark name="12"/> over <mark name="11"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">b</say-as> <break time="250ms"/> </prosody></speak>

Cap012.expected: <?xml version="1.0"?><speak version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis"><prosody rate="100%"> <mark name="0"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">c</say-as> <mark name="1"/> squared <mark name="3"/> equals <mark name="4"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">a</say-as> <mark name="5"/> squared <mark name="7"/> plus <mark name="8"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">b</say-as> <mark name="9"/> squared <mark name="11"/> minus <mark name="12"/> 2 <mark name="13"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">a</say-as> <mark name="14"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">b</say-as> <mark name="15"/> cosine <mark name="16"/> cap C <break time="250ms"/> </prosody></speak>

Cap014.expected: <?xml version="1.0"?><speak version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis"><prosody rate="100%"> <prosody rate="+25%"> <mark name="0"/> cap A <break time="250ms"/> <mark name="1"/> cap B </prosody> <break time="250ms"/> </prosody></speak>

Cap015.expected: <?xml version="1.0"?><speak version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis"><prosody rate="100%"> <prosody rate="+25%"> <mark name="0"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">a</say-as> <break time="250ms"/> <mark name="1"/> cap A </prosody> <break time="250ms"/> </prosody></speak>

Cap016.expected: <?xml version="1.0"?><speak version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis"><prosody rate="100%"> <prosody rate="+25%"> <mark name="0"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">b</say-as> <break time="250ms"/> <mark name="1"/> cap A </prosody> <break time="250ms"/> </prosody></speak>

Cap017.expected: <?xml version="1.0"?><speak version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis"><prosody rate="100%"> <prosody rate="+25%"> <mark name="0"/> cap B <break time="250ms"/> <mark name="1"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">a</say-as> </prosody> <break time="250ms"/> </prosody></speak>
